Field Detail

MAX_SIZE

public static int MAX_SIZE
Maximum number of values that a VectorObjectSource can store. If the data set is defined using 10 attributes then the maximum number of records is 3000000

data

protected java.util.Vector data
Vector with the data objects

get

public java.lang.Object get(int index)
Gets the data record at the specific position given

Specified by:
get in class ObjectSource
Parameters:
index - The index of the data object to be returned
Returns:
The data object at the given position, null if there is not object at that position

add

public boolean add(LabeledObject x)
Adds a new data sample to the data set if there is memory

Parameters:
x - New data sample to be added into the data set
Returns:
True if the data sample was added. false in other case

To Clear the vector

public void close()
Close the data source

Overrides:
close in class ObjectSource

get

public ObjectSource get(java.util.Vector index)
Get a new data source with the selected data records

Parameters:
index - Data records that will define the new data source. I suggest to sort the vector before calling this method in order to speed up the algorithm
Returns:
A new data source with the selected objects

elements

public java.util.Enumeration elements()
Returns an Enumeration object for traversing the data source sequentially

Specified by:
elements in class ObjectSource
Returns:
an Enumeration object for traversing the data source sequentially. In this case the enumeration object is an enumeration object of the inner vector object

loadBinary

public static BufferSource loadBinary(java.lang.String fileName)
Load the vector data source from the given file

Parameters:
fileName - Name of the file where the data source will be stored. It is saved in binary format
Returns:
The vector data source read from file if it contains a VectorObjectSource null in other case

saveBinary

public void saveBinary(java.lang.String fileName)
Save the vector data source to the given file

Parameters:
fileName - Name of the file from the data source will be loaded. Binary format
